content: Does anyone know of a profile for the manual entry of measurement data (for example, when it does not come from a device or is read from a non-communicating device)?

That sounds like an extension on Observation.device like I did for the OMH schema element "modality".

Test Schema = valid_step_count
Observation.category =  physical-activity
Observation.code = 55423-8 (Number of steps in unspecified time Pedometer)
